Name: Above - VR
About the game: Above is a virtual experience that place the player in the position of a stranded astronaut in space. Join the main character in a visually stunning experience during the last minutes of his life. Being minutes away from death, the human being let's his everyday problems behind to appreciate the true immensity of the universe. You will get a relaxing sensation and during those minutes be free. Enjoy the continents and oceans of our homeplanet like you never seen before!
